DocAttribute.Name: OuterCurve
DocAttribute.Documentation: Bounded curve, defining the outer boundaries of the arbitrary profile.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR1
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The curve used for the outer curve definition shall have the dimensionality of 2.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR2
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The outer curve shall not be of type IfcLine as IfcLine is not a closed curve.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR3
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The outer curve shall not be of type IfcOffsetCurve2D as it should not be defined as an offset of another curve.
